text: And We made the fat camel/cow as part of God's rituals (of pilgrimage) for you. There is goodness for you in them, so mention Godâ€™s name on them as they are lined up, then when they fall (on the ground) on their sides, eat from them and feed the poor and the beggar. That is how We put them under your control (and at you service), so you may be thankful
